title: Show "Save Address" button on Transaction Status page and enable Saving an Address

labels.name: E:Mobile Wallet Save Address Page MVP
labels.description: all issues for the save address page of the wallet

body: # Feature Issue ### User Story As a user, I want to be able to save an address in the Transaction Status page **so that** I can quickly choose it for future transactions ### Description Figma design 1: https://www.figma.com/file/HKncH4wnDwZDAhc4AryK8Y/Wallet-for-Mobile?type=design&node-id=2087-615282&mode=design&t=bR18stv43uRLwfK3-4 Figma design 2: https://www.figma.com/file/HKncH4wnDwZDAhc4AryK8Y/Wallet-for-Mobile?type=design&node-id=1518-358466&mode=design&t=bR18stv43uRLwfK3-4 Figma design 3: https://www.figma.com/file/HKncH4wnDwZDAhc4AryK8Y/Wallet-for-Mobile?type=design&node-id=1518-358506&mode=design&t=bR18stv43uRLwfK3-4 Figma design 4: https://www.figma.com/file/HKncH4wnDwZDAhc4AryK8Y/Wallet-for-Mobile?type=design&node-id=1518-358546&mode=design&t=bR18stv43uRLwfK3-4 Figma design 5: https://www.figma.com/file/HKncH4wnDwZDAhc4AryK8Y/Wallet-for-Mobile?type=design&node-id=1518-358621&mode=design&t=bR18stv43uRLwfK3-4 Visual reference: ### Acceptance Criteria - [ ] If transaction receiver is a not saved address, show the "Save address" button at the left of the "Done"button, like in Figma design 1. - [ ] When user taps "Save address" button, bottom sheet should be shown as in Figma design 2. - [ ] When user types a name for the address, initials in the top rounded box should be updated and "Save address" button should be enabled. - [ ] When input looses focus, edit button should appear at the right of the input. User can press edit button to edit name again. - [ ] When input is focused, char count view should appear. - [ ] Max characters count for the name is 24. - [ ] User can set a Color for that address. Background gradient should update to reflect selected Color, whenever selected Color changes. - [ ] Address suffix should reflect network preferences (`eth:` in blue if mainnet is in preferences, `opt:` in red if Optimism is in preferences, `arb:` in turquoise if Arbitrum is in preferences). Default preferences are Mainnet and Optimism. - [ ] For this issue, networks preferences should not be editable. That will be implemented in a separate issue. - [ ] When user presses "Save address" button in the bottom sheet, address should be saved for the selected account, bottom sheet is dismissed, and in-app notification should be shown as in Figma design 5. - [ ] Light and dark mode should be implemented Feel free to break up this issue in smaller issues if necessary
